paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: After retraining the MDN model using the top 12 features identified by feature-importance analysis, the model achieves an R2 of 0.98 on the testing dataset which is the same as the performance obtained with all 41 features
instruction: The code loads the MDN model trained using the top 12 features, evaluates it on the testing dataset, and prints the resulting R2 value
Confirm that the reported R2 is 0.98.
